channel.title: [BUG] Strange light behavior in Office Complex
channel.description:
This may be just an issue in Source but I noticed this strange light behavior in the beginning of Office Complex. The light casted onto the brush treats it like a hard edge surface where the edge of the tris are.
[url=https://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/855/bmc1a2a0007.jpg/][img]https://imageshack.us/a/img855/2310/bmc1a2a0007.jpg[/img][/url]
bm_c1a2a -512 x, 178 y, 72 z
